title: Two Sum
statement:
# Two Sum

Find two numbers in an array that add up to a target.

## Problem Description

Given an array of N integers and a target sum T, find two distinct indices i and j such that arr[i] + arr[j] = T. Print the indices (0-based) in ascending order.

## Input Format

First line: two integers N and T
Second line: N space-separated integers

## Output Format

Two space-separated indices (smaller first), or `NOT FOUND` if no solution.

## Constraints

- 2 ≤ N ≤ 10^4
- Exactly one solution exists if found
